channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Uploading SVG, WEBP and ICO files
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Uploading SVG, WEBP and ICO files

item.title: CVE-2023-4460|2024-08-02T07:31:05.452Z -- unknown -- uploading%20svg%2C%20webp%20and%20ico%20files
item.description: The Uploading SVG, WEBP and ICO files WordPress plugin through 1.2.1 does not sanitise uploaded SVG files, which could allow users with a role as low as Author to upload a malicious SVG containing XSS payloads.
